name: Enerfair Engagement Ltd
legal: Private Limited Company registered in England
goal: Enerfair Engagement Ltd is a micro-consultancy offering strategic communications and policy support services to organisations working to tackle climate change, reduce carbon dioxide emissions and transition towards a net zero emissions economy.
euInitiatives: During 2017, Enerfair Engagement Ltd has undertaken work on the Clean Energy Package, the ETS Innovation Fund and Clean Mobility Package.
